import React from "react"; function About() { return (

How-To Guide: Workforce Management System

Introduction

Welcome to the Workforce Management System, designed to optimize your workforce scheduling and management. This guide will help you navigate through the system's key features, enabling you to efficiently manage associates, schedules, and metrics.

Accessing the System

    1. Open Your Web Browser: Launch your preferred web browser.
    2. Navigate to the System: Enter the URL provided by your administrator or IT department.

Logging In

    Username and Password: Use the credentials provided by your administrator to log in.
    Dashboard: Once logged in, you will be directed to the dashboard, which provides an overview of various functionalities.

Managing Associates

    Navigate to 'Associates': In the sidebar menu, click on 'Associates'.
    Add New Associate: Click on 'Add Associate' to enter details like name, job class, and performance metrics.
    Edit/Delete Associate: Locate the associate in the list and use the 'Edit' or 'Delete' buttons as needed.

Generating Schedules

Sam Wade Links

GitHub
LinkedIn
); } export default About;
